short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A feature-packed distraction-free web reader with dyslexia support and research tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reader Mode is a feature-packed Chrome reading extension and web app that removes clutter, ads and distractions, while also includes advanced features such as dyslexia support, bookmarking, annotating, highlighting and text-to-speech.

Highlighted Features
✔ Distraction-free and ad-free "Reader Mode"
✔ Deletion of unwanted elements
✔ Theme customization
✔ Custom theme
✔ Custom CSS
✔ Print pages
✔ Fullscreen mode
✔ Auto-run ability
✔ Save edited pages
✔ Share To Twitter
✔ Dyslexia Fonts
✔ Dyslexia Ruler
✔ and many more!

To see all the features and learn more, check out https://readermode.io
